comments_data.body:
The root cause is that we don't handle region apply snapshot event and the snapshot cause region epoch version change. 

When the region is loaded, it's epoch version is 221:
```
[2024/08/20 09:19:50.444 +00:00] [INFO] [range_manager.rs:186] ["update region meta state"] [new_state=Active] [curr_state=Loading] [epoch=221] [region_id=34855] [thread_id=28]
```
And the it apply snapshot and epoch version is updated to 222:
```
[2024/08/20 09:23:40.293 +00:00] [INFO] [peer_storage.rs:731] ["apply snapshot with state ok"] [for_witness=false] [state="applied_index: 2339250 truncated_state { index: 2339250 term: 19 }"] [region="id: 34855 start_key: 7480000000000000FF875F698000000000FF00000A03800F922DFF8A04291203800000FF0000000000038000FF0000000000000150FF656E64696E6700FEFF03800F922D8A0429FF120380005CE7DDF3FF9950000000000000F9 end_key: 7480000000000000FF875F698000000000FF00000F014572726FFF72000000FC038000FF0000000000010380FF0807BF8F3F2E1B03FF8003717093912210FF0000000000000000F7 region_epoch { conf_ver: 504 version: 222 } peers { id: 35024 store_id: 1 } peers { id: 35080 store_id: 184 } peers { id: 35098 store_id: 4 } peers { id: 35107 store_id: 183 role: Learner }"] [peer_id=35107] [region_id=34855] [thread_id=109]
```
And then it met split event and check epoch version fails and then panic:
```
[2024/08/20 09:26:11.992 +00:00] [INFO] [eviction.rs:99] ["in-memory-engine handle region split"] [new_regions="[id: 35112 start_key: 7480000000000000FF875F698000000000FF00000A03800F922DFF8A04291203800000FF0000000000038000FF0000000000000150FF656E64696E6700FEFF03800F922D8A0429FF120380005CE7DDF3FF9950000000000000F9 end_key: 7480000000000000FF875F698000000000FF00000F014572726FFF72000000FC038000FF0000000000010380FF040AF9ACDEE86603FF800369FE9A30EFC0FF0000000000000000F7 region_epoch { conf_ver: 509 version: 223 } peers { id: 35113 store_id: 1 } peers { id: 35114 store_id: 4 } peers { id: 35115 store_id: 183 }, id: 34855 start_key: 7480000000000000FF875F698000000000FF00000F014572726FFF72000000FC038000FF0000000000010380FF040AF9ACDEE86603FF800369FE9A30EFC0FF0000000000000000F7 end_key: 7480000000000000FF875F698000000000FF00000F014572726FFF72000000FC038000FF0000000000010380FF0807BF8F3F2E1B03FF8003717093912210FF0000000000000000F7 region_epoch { conf_ver: 509 version: 223 } peers { id: 35024 store_id: 1 } peers { id: 35098 store_id: 4 } peers { id: 35107 store_id: 183 }]"] [region="id: 34855 start_key: 7480000000000000FF875F698000000000FF00000A03800F922DFF8A04291203800000FF0000000000038000FF0000000000000150FF656E64696E6700FEFF03800F922D8A0429FF120380005CE7DDF3FF9950000000000000F9 end_key: 7480000000000000FF875F698000000000FF00000F014572726FFF72000000FC038000FF0000000000010380FF0807BF8F3F2E1B03FF8003717093912210FF0000000000000000F7 region_epoch { conf_ver: 509 version: 222 } peers { id: 35024 store_id: 1 } peers { id: 35098 store_id: 4 } peers { id: 35107 store_id: 183 }"] [admin_command=BatchSplit] [region_id=34855] [thread_id=112]
```

After discussing with @overvenus , we decided to fix this by observing region apply snapshot event and evicting the target region.
This issue is introduced by #17237 as it removed the observer of apply snapshot.
